lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Cafe Owner/Artist-Potter

lender.name: Thunderbird for Good
lender.occupational_info:
Thunderbird for Good--a non-profit CSR initiative of Thunderbird School of Global Management--is committed to leveraging the school's expertise in global business in order to provide learning experiences for students who would not otherwise have access to a Thunderbird education.
The Thunderbird International Development Association is a student organization that seeks to add value to the Thunderbird experience through unique interactions with forward-thinking individuals eager to use business skills to make a difference. The IDA strives to prepare students for careers in the private, public and non-profit sectors that use the MBA degree as a means of making a lasting impact on society and the planet as a whole.
The money we invest here is raised through our Beer for Good initiative.

lender.name: Morgan and Jason
lender.loan_because: We are all connected to each other.
lender.occupational_info: Morgan studies earthquakes for a living, and Jason studies magnets & other interesting materials. We love music, dancing, and games.

lender.name: Eiji Hida
lender.loan_because: I am a farmer. I would like to support the food production of the world, especially in developing country. If I can help people with my money, It will be my big pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: I have been working in the orchard where was managing apple trees. And in the farm where I looked after cattles, piggery, poultly and organic vegitables. And now I am working on the sea, cultivating fish.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lender.name: M+M+C
lender.loan_because: We will help Peoples

lender.name: Break-A-Leg Productions
lender.loan_because: We are a group of young English performers in eastern Quebec

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: I love the thought that I am contributing in my own small way to someone living a life of dignity and hope.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I have so much comfort in my life- plenty of food, more than adequate shelter, etc. I feel this is the very least I could do to help another human being in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse. I take care of sick or injured people.

lender.name: vina
lender.loan_because: i am 23 years with a tall and light complexioned lady .i am about 55 kg by weight and 178 cm tall .i love travelling and swimming, .my hobbies are dancing , singing , watching movies and walking the beach .i so much believe in love and i am intereted in meeting positive people who are friendly and who are humble and believes in God .I love to meet a nice and lovely man who is matured and reserved .
lender.occupational_info: i am 23 years with a tall and light complexioned lady .i am about 55 kg by weight and 178 cm tall .i love travelling and swimming, .my hobbies are dancing , singing , watching movies and walking the beach .i so much believe in love and i am intereted in meeting positive people who are friendly and who are humble and believes in God .I love to meet a nice and lovely man who is matured and reserved .

lender.name: A.J.
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student working on a degree in secondary education.

lender.name: Tomislav
lender.loan_because: It is a good feeling to spread the wealth. Small amounts that make no difference in my life but can be a huge help to someone half a world away.
lender.occupational_info: I perform IT and other duties for a small company in Fl. Working long hours and intense nature of work leave me with little energy for anything else. Finding out about Kiva seemed like a great opportunity to help out in the larger community without need for much more energy than a few clicks.

lender.name: Mahmoud
lender.loan_because: I believe i love humanity and the spirit of resilience of poor people. I believe that poverty is created by the wrong decisions done by leaders who do not care about citizens/

lender.name: emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school to become a medical researcher and a doctor.

lender.name: Angie
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor who takes care of families

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: it makes me more thankful for the things I take for granted. I also think these hard-working people deserve the help.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of elderly people in their homes.

lender.name: Matt and Michelle Keen
lender.occupational_info: I am a personal banker for a large american bank.

lender.name: Billy B
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra that I can share. The opportunity to do without something material to help some one realize their dreams; make their life a little easier and help them grow is better than any interest rate a bank can pay.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to change the world a small step at a time
lender.occupational_info: I learn things at my school.

lender.name: Croft
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky. I am retired with a good Union pension and am now able to give back a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired telecommunications technician who enjoys traveling in Central Mexico in the winter and laying in my hammock in the summer. Life has been good to me.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and promote websites.

lender.name: darren
lender.loan_because: lending money recycles it so that it may help people gain the confidence and skill set to make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build and operate restaurants.

lender.name: Roman
lender.loan_because: CBN
lender.occupational_info: Christian

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are having a tough time in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired preschool teacher

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it gives people a chance to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: property management, renovation project management, real estate investment

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need, people who are hard working, and people who are making contribution to the society.

lender.name: Dasha & Darren
lender.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do, a much more direct way to help people. As an entrepreneur myself, I believe in working for yourself to get ahead. I love that this is such an interactive and personal way to contribute to the world.

lender.name: Helen's People
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.name: Casper
lender.loan_because: I can. I'm lucky enough to been born in The Netherlands (Europe), so I don't have anything to complain about. Because I travel a lot with Ilse, my wife, I know it's not always easy for other people around the globe to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: Nowadays I have 2 jobs at the firebrigade: at the emergency operations center and as a responding firefighter.

lender.name: Michael and Sara
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: husband works at a university and mom stays at home with two wonderful children.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: Microfinance rocks!

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: It's another way to help. I love the idea of supporting people trying to make a living with their own businesses is less than ideal circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an underserved clinic in the Bronx, carrying for many immigrants from Southeast Asia and Central and South America.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Credit is an essential element of a healthy economy. Credit markets are not adequate in certain parts of the world. Kiva fills this gap.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the accounting and treasury operations of a technology company.

lender.name: Claire C.
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel more connected to people in the world

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Every time I make a loan to someone through Kiva, I feel like I have made a positive change in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I have three jobs: Husband, Dad, and employee of a defense contractor. I love all my jobs, but husband and dad will always be my favorites.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I just love this site - it is such a great and simple idea! It goes beyond giving to a charity as you know exactly where the money is going - you KNOW you are helping out a person or persons in need. You feel directly involved and connected to the Entrepreneurs. What is only a relatively small amount to me can be given to them to help them help themselves. It is not only a grant of money, it is a grant of empowerment and dignity. And then you get the money back and you can start the whole wonderful process again! W00t!!

lender.name: Mike & Martha
lender.loan_because: Providing for nutrition is essential. Supporting the work of women supports the survivability of their family, country and the world.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: There's nothing like being your own boss. People shouldn't be stuck in debt to banks or corporations just because they need to feed their family.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: people have believed in me over the years financially and I wanted to give back and give others a chance to succeed in places where it might not be so easy to get loans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach anatomy & physiology of the human body to college students.

lender.name: Ronnie & Denise
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ Saved Us With His Precious Blood! He has Taken Us Out Of Poverty & Made Us Prosporus. We Give In Order To Give Glory To God!

lender.name: douglas
lender.loan_because: My $500 loaned over and over and over again is making a difference in the lives of the people this money is loaned to...it makes me feel like I am making a difference! I am providing the funds for these people to empower themselves and make their lives better for their families! ..and it doesn't cost me anything except some lost interest on my money...virtually no cost at all!!

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I don't have enough money to give, but this way I can at least do something :)
lender.occupational_info: I paint pictures

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: Well, I loan because I believe in giving back. I think this sort of loaning is great! I give to help others and if they repay great, means I can then re loan to help another. If they don't repay then that's ok as well because I treat this as a donation not a loan.

lender.name: Mujtaba
lender.loan_because: want to do small business.
lender.occupational_info: exporting Pakistani mangoes,wheat straw(animal fodder), Nacl iodized salt

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I am amazed at the impact your program has around the world and wanted to be a part of it.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I understand the value of a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the federal government to ensure our banks are following US laws, being fair to consumers and are financially secure.

lender.name: Sydney & Gabriella
lender.loan_because: Why would you not help someone out.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students with disabilities

lender.name: noah
lender.loan_because: i believe in what they are doing

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lender.name: Becky & Amit
lender.loan_because: We like to know we're doing our part to help people achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help someone get on their feet and start building a successful business.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: PÃ¤ivi
lender.loan_because: I believe in person-to-person help.

lender.name: Phoebus
lender.loan_because: As my mother would say, "Karma". Looking at the world's problems collectively makes for seemingly insurmountable problems. Helping one person at a time makes a difference for at least that one person, though, right?
lender.occupational_info: "Complicated."

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I believe giving a hand up is worth more than giving a hand out.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: Others have helped me in the past.

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.occupational_info: Our for-profit company is dedicated to helping economically disadvantaged women worldwide by providing a market for their Fair Trade, eco-friendly handicrafts.

lender.name: Jo
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and bring peace, love and hope to others.

lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.loan_because: This is possibly the easiest way to empower people in need.
lender.occupational_info: First attempt to help somebody whom i never met.

lender.name: Dean/Lori
lender.loan_because: We like to help others that are trying to better their life.

lender.name: James & Alison
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am a giver and I believe God put me here to help others help themselves. What we have no matter how little is meant to help others.

lender.name: Carola
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people especially women all over the world directly and at once
lender.occupational_info: I am working as housewife and at the reception of a dental praxis

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: the world is a small, small place, and only getting smaller. And neighbors help neighbors.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adults from all over the world who have immigrated to San Francisco.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I am a college student working towards a business degree and understand the difficulty of becoming an entrepreneur. I think the entrepreneurs on Kiva deserve this money to start something great in their communities and begin wonderful lives for themselves.

lender.name: julie
lender.loan_because: even a small amount from me can make a positive impact in someone else's life. Thank you for allowing me this gift in my life.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: Free handouts do not work, teach a man to fish and can eat for a lifetime as long as someone doesn't poison the water. Give a man a fish and he will sit and wait for another one.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I know the feeling of having the weight lifted from your shoulders after receiving a much needed loan to secure an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs.

lender.name: Opal
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help their children. Thanks to the Kensington kids who donated $5.00.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 6th grade student in the fall.

lender.name: Margit
lender.loan_because: I want to decrease unnecessary suffering through small acts of kindness.

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: I support the idea of giving people access to loans in order to achieve their goal of becoming more self-sustainable
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time mom of 2 school aged boys and a part-time figure skating coach. I also work part-time at the local community centre and do volunteer work at my sons' school.

lender.name: Nate Rosenberg
lender.occupational_info: Because they have a lot of employees, businesses need bigger Internet connections than individual homes. My company provides large connections between offices and to the public Internet.

lender.name: Taher
lender.loan_because: It helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make the internet work better.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work for the United Nations as an accountant

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to somebody.

lender.name: The Laughlin Family
lender.occupation: 11 and 9 year old kids and teacher
lender.loan_because: I don't want my children thinking "It's all about me." For the world to become a better place, they should learn "It's all about we.."
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school biology teacher.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: in North America we are the richest and most miserable people on earth! We have far too much STUFF and it's not making us happy. Giving is more fun than getting! If I can bless someone from my abundance, I receive far more than I give.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising five beautiful daughters. I am not working right now but am searching for part-time work that will allow me to still be here for my girls.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: giving should be a way of life :)

lender.name: MARTHA
lender.loan_because: ITS AN HONOR TO HELP IN A SMALL WAY

lender.name: Lee-Ellen
lender.loan_because: Here in the USA, we make important improvements to our lives through cautious loans (such as our home, car, and educational loans); why not help other people do the same!
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories to kids and adults, and teach storytelling too.

lender.name: Marylou
lender.loan_because: there is a satisfaction in knowing for such a small amount invested, someone across the world can better their life
lender.occupational_info: The Lord enlisted the help of ordinary men who were poor and hard working - He served the less fortunate and all He asked for was our faithfulness. He went to the Cross so we could live with our sins forgiven. Being a part of Kiva allows me to give back in small measure, for what He did for all of us.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help people earn their own money. I have enough money to live on.

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.occupational_info: I write science texts and children books. I published one children book but hope to get published more, so I earn my money wirting scientific texts which I enjoy too.

lender.name: Alexa
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Student at Georgetown University Law Center

lender.name: Laura and Huu
lender.loan_because: We have the opportunity to work to improve our lives and want to help others who want to work and improve their lives, too.
lender.occupational_info: We help cleanup contamination in the environment.

lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: Microfinance seems to me one of the best ways to improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying physics, to understand the way the universe works.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: My daughter gave me this for Mother's Day and I intend to continue to loan to help people lead better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a factory, am now retired and have since worked for Greenpeace and am on the Oceanside Housing Commission, which provides affordable housing for our residents.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed I am not rich. But if you are making it in today's society, you give by helping and paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I love to educate people on insurance. It is lots of concentration and paperwork.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: The Event industry believes we should help others as we were
lender.occupational_info: My occupation : Floral and Event Designer

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Jehovah loves it when we give each other a helping hand (Proverbs 19:17).

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Everyone knows the Dollar isn't what it used to be however, as we can readily see, there are many places in the world where a Dollar still goes a very long way. This is an excellent intermediate step for me on my way to becoming a philanthropist.

lender.name: WLC
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP

lender.name: BigChefonline
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur. The access to capital is a challenge for small business owners, but the success of a business improve the quality of live of many people.
lender.occupational_info: A health conscious food manufacturing established in 1999.

lender.name: Farrah
lender.loan_because: I have faith in people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a manger for a large insurance company.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bio-pharmaceutical company.

lender.name: Lilla
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary in a real estate office.

lender.name: Kepes Family
lender.loan_because: Its one small way to effect social change
lender.occupational_info: Changing the world - or trying to

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Reading the stories truly inspires me to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I aid doctors in treating their patients through specimen analysis.

lender.name: Ray - Austin
lender.loan_because: It's a great supplement to charity, teaching, reinforcing personal responsibility and the value it brings.

lender.name: Ariela
lender.loan_because: I believe...

lender.name: Melody and Simon
lender.loan_because: we care.
lender.occupational_info: Melody is the Executive Director for a non-profit organization that's mission is to foster a secular society based on science, reason, freedom of inquiry, and humanist values. Simon works as a Marketing Director.

lender.name: Marcia & Larry
lender.loan_because: giving a hand up is a great lesson to teach our children.
lender.occupational_info: We help people sell the home they currently own or find a home to live in.

lender.name: virginia
lender.loan_because: i'm not well off by western standards, and struggle a bit to maintain a certain standard of living, with all the things i think i need to be comfortable, like phones and internet connections and a nice (rental) roof over my head and food in the fridge (i work at self sufficiency) and dvd and so on... so this is a kind of a reality check and a remonder that no matter how much i think I am struggling, by the standards of the working poor I am privileged, in very many respects, and i have enough to share. The entrepreneurial spirit demonstrated by these business people in developing countries is admirable, and kiva enables me to assist in a very simple, non bureaucratic way... cutting out the middle man, anyone who might want to take a piece of what i want to loan freely to who i choose...
lender.occupational_info: I am technically unemployed (due to personal circumstances), but work freelancing creating websites from home. I do some gardening for other local people sometimes. I have trained as a yoga teacher. I am an artist, and I write. I hope one day to publish. I live on a small 5 acre property, which i rent with 4 others, and we run a very small number of cattle, some for beef, some for dairy. I make butter and yoghurt and cheese from our cow, rosie. Since i don't work, I manage most of the farming activities and the house. I grow vegetables and we have chickens for eggs.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to be self-employed and how rewarding it is. This is a small way that I can give back to help other women, especially in my field, who desire to be self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-employed hairstylist and colorist taking care of clients haircare needs and all aspects of running a business,from ordering products and supplies to managing the books.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I know it makes a difference to those who need it.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rumi
lender.loan_because: I want to support women in developing countries who often face disadvantages in accessing resources in their societies.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working with data everyday--economic, political, demographic--to find patterns of social facts.

lender.name: LOMO
lender.loan_because: I want to be a support to someone else, it makes me feel good knowing I can reach out.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it's necessary as one human being to another to accept our fragile existence. i am truly elated when that choice positively impacts all of us.
lender.occupational_info: to survive , we have to meet the worlds demands . so everything has to be transported.

lender.name: alison
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It is people helping people. I feel much better giving to a person in need with a dream and goal than a government without a prayer.
lender.occupational_info: I work on equipment fixing it to help keep our country secure.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I care!
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and raise my children.

lender.name: Solara
lender.loan_because: I am lending on behalf of my group with whom I meditate. We are delighted to be able help people who struggle to be independent and earn a decent living in coutries where this is so difficult . Each of us has different God-given gifts and together we work as a team to help change the world
lender.occupational_info: My work involves Reiki healing and flower essence remedies which are vibrational essences to assist people with emotional, spiritual, mental and physical challenges that most of us face in our daily lives.

lender.name: Kathrin
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great and efficient way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Reinhold
lender.loan_because: we had hard times but are doing better, so we give to others because we live in a wealthy country
lender.occupational_info: I work in a helpline for computer problems

lender.name: Jesper G. Laursen
lender.loan_because: I wish to support people who want to better their lives and this way their initiative can stretch beyond themselves and to other people in the same situation, when the money paid back are lent out again.
lender.occupational_info: Scriptwriter

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: For me it's nothing, for the people whom I'll be lending to this is their chance.
lender.occupational_info: DJing is my passion, my tech support job pays my bills...;)

lender.name: Kazeem
lender.loan_because: I wish to meet my ends need and to start an investmnet before I started producing children, to put my family in a well sound financial status.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I am earning salary but all goes on food and transportation. So I wish to use the loan to get a bus and use it for transportation withing the Nigeria capital, Abuja were I am currently staying.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I hope that someone - who perhaps hasn't had access to the opportunities I have had - will be able to use my funds to do something good, for themselves and their families. Hopefully my funds will help people create new businesses or grow their existing businesses to generate more funds for many years to come. Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I am in my final year of university, studying accounting and finance. I also teach at university.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: We spend so much money on unnecessary things - why not invest in something reasonable

lender.name: Saija
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to help especially women and girls for better life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life. I feel I should help others when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit whose mission is to eliminate cruelty and suffering of animals

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: If someone has an idea to improve their standard of living and the initiative to follow it through, I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 30 years for Chrysler, an automotive company, in many capacities. I spent time working with engineers in Brazil, Italy and Mexico. My longest job assignment was on truck sheet metal parts like doors, hoods and fenders, making sure the design could be stamped and assembled.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have sustainable business and help orphans kids.
lender.occupational_info: Making awareness program, helping poor and helpless people in northeast India.

lender.name: Samy
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of this project

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I manage servers, develop software, network computers, provide technical support, etc.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I woudn't see it any other way.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: In life one reaps what one sows.

lender.name: hubert & brenda
lender.loan_because: We wish to see everyone succeed in life....financially and emotionally. We hope our donations can help people make their dreams turn into reality!
lender.occupational_info: Trading the equity stock markets

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people and I am thankful that I can do this.
lender.occupational_info: I help children in school learn how to be successful.

lender.name: ShailendarLegacy
lender.loan_because: Shailendar (left in the picture) died on June 19th, 2008. He was a light in our lives that burned brightly albeit for a short time, he taught us to not take living for granted and live life to the fullest. In his memory we are setting up a fund to help others live a fulfilling life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of folks that work in Information Technology.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's great to have the opportunity to help people who do what they can to help themselves. So little does so much.

lender.name: Lara
lender.occupation: Director, United Nations Association, New York

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am in the military

lender.name: Daniel & Rachel
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who have the will but not the resources to get ahead.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe that commerce is the way to eradicate poverty. Access to capital is an essential component of commerce.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that organize data needed by a company that buys and sells electricity, coal, oil, natural gas and other energy related commodities.

lender.name: Brian Metzker
lender.occupational_info: I am an undergraduate student at the University of California, Berkeley majoring in Political Science. My focus is African Politics and International Relations. I also volunteer for the African Immigrant and Refugee Resource Center in San Francisco, CA. For more information, please see "My website."

lender.name: Inslee
lender.loan_because: God has been good to my family and we wish to share his gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I am the General Counsel (lawyer) for an defense contractor in the US.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: I want to be socially responsible and I love to see people go into business for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer and businessman.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate to live in the US and to have what I need to live. Other people are not as fortunate. They deserve to live as well as they can using their talents and skills. Just a little money can go a long way with these loans.
lender.occupational_info: I design clothing, sew and knit. I am also a landscape architect and gardener. I am passionate about the environment and about equality among all people.

lender.name: Yuri
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed to be able to help others in need. Small amount of money can make a significant impact on someone's business and improve their family's life.

lender.name: Sloane
lender.loan_because: I have benefited my entire life from the generosity of those around me. It is my greatest pleasure to be able to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am a recruiting manager. I help a large energy company find people to fill its jobs.

lender.name: Kanchan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make pretty pictures

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: There's really no good reason not to.

lender.name: TJ, Kara, Micah & Stella
lender.loan_because: We want to help where we can, and we want to teach our son to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer engineer. I design computer motherboards.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I like to know that what I donate goes directly to someone who will use it.
lender.occupational_info: I make tv and film documentaries about social, cultural and political issues.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, and so I want to bless others. Kiva is both a kind and intelligent way to give.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: How can you not?
lender.occupational_info: We build websites and advertise them online.

lender.name: Herman H
lender.loan_because: 3rd world entrepreneurs who deal with infrastructure issues must be encouraged.
lender.occupational_info: Business consultant working with financial and IT systems for small businesses.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in farm safety for the Department of Agriculture. My job is to help farm producers and rural families become aware of farm hazards and take positive steps to reduce or eliminate those hazards.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to help themselves & their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Federal Government in Canada. I am married and have a baby girl.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I am immensely thankful for the opportunities I have been given and want to give back to those less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think this is a good way to let people who need it share in the rich lives that we have in the west.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the fire brigade but not on the fire truck. My work is about preventing fire. Checking buildings, giving out permits and making sure that people know the dangers of fire.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I feel that we who are better off financially,should help others to also obtain a better and healthier lifestyle
lender.occupational_info: I started working in 1946 and worked for 46 years and retired in 1993

lender.name: emmalyn
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students at a university

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: we are stewards of the world we inhabit, and those of us who have experienced good fortune have an obligation to assist those who wish to attempt to improve their life, or the lives of their family or community.

lender.name: Malerie and Ted
lender.loan_because: Because Malerie visited Africa and saw their world first hand.
lender.occupational_info:
Malerie (daughter) is a DJ and event planner for a local radio station.
Ted (father) is a commercial banker

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe we really can change the world!

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: Together, we can make a difference!

lender.name: kamila, Macielle & Nati
lender.loan_because: We love to help!!! A little bit, adds up.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves. I have been extremely blessed throughout my life and would like to share this with others so they too may feel His powerful love and pass that understanding on to others.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur - integrating finance, economics, and non-linear analysis to design systems that help solve or optimize the management of portfolio risk, ecosystems, organ transplant chains, and other issues

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: Despite being a "poor graduate student", I am blessed with so much. And as Ralph Waldo Emerson once said, "To know that one life has breathed easier because I have lived. This is to have succeeded."
lender.occupational_info: I study human memory.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: I love to see people all over the world have the opportunity to experience thier dream. Nothing is more satisfying to see apparent hopelessness in peoples eyes turn into excitement, joy and that ultimate feeling of loving security so many take for granted.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: Loaning money is a fantastic way of empowering people to break the cycle of poverty. I like the idea that my money can be used and then reloaned to another person who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm spending two years in a rural Moroccan community, working with community leaders to plan and carry out projects related to environmental reclamation and sustainable development.

lender.name: Keino
lender.loan_because: I should...the world is interconnected. I am blessed to have what I need. I wish the same for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I work in developing countries and want to help out as much as possible. Kiva is a great resource to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I help United Nations, NGOs, and other organizations with administration, operations, and project coordination.

lender.name: Elana
lender.loan_because: I've read too much Utilitarian philosophy. And honestly, what was I going to spend that money on? Comic books, makeup, and video games.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a shop that sells collectible toys, comic books, trading cards, and games. Aside from the fact that no one actually needs these things, the prices are further inflated by a shared delusion of "collectibleness". I work in an industry of luxury and indulgence, so it's my duty to take some of my income and see that it actually goes somewhere useful.

lender.name: IIPP Cohort
lender.loan_because: We wanted to stay close as a cohort while doing something that suits our interests, and aids in International Development. Jackpot!
lender.occupational_info: Students in International Affairs.

lender.name: Theodore
lender.loan_because: I know how it is to try to start a business and not have any capital to fund your idea.
lender.occupational_info: Very tiring, but fulfilling. I work with Iraqis to help make their communities better.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I provide bookkeeping, income tax and business services for small businesses.

lender.name: kayla
lender.loan_because: I feel that although I don't have much, I do have more than many people and I should help them out in any way I can.

lender.name: Tania
lender.loan_because: Gratitude. Every day I am grateful that I have been born in a time and place that allows me and my family to prosper. For me, the next step of truly being grateful is to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I buy day old chicks and raise them to laying age. I then sell some and keep the rest to sell their eggs.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.occupational_info: I develop photos from negative film and digital images. Photography is amazing, and occasionally humbing. I've been working in this field for 10 years.

lender.name: allan
lender.loan_because: we need to help those people to help themselves. This is not a handout. This is helping others to become self sufficient and making a better world.
lender.occupational_info: We in Canada have so much and it is very important to share with those who have so little. Lets all do a litlle to bring the world up to our standards.

lender.name: Kalpana
lender.loan_because: I would like a make a difference with this contribution which may help the economy is a very small way but may go a long way to help someone's life!!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It matters. And I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher/student working to improve every aspect of my life and hope to pass along some of the good fortune I have received.

lender.name: Irina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a diferrence
lender.occupational_info: I am helping people to insure their investments for the best terms possible

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I feel it helps me make a difference to those that are trying very hard to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain the Internet network for a local telecommunications company supplying internet and television services to hundreds of thousands of people.

lender.name: Bruce and Virginia
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate in our lives and want to help others who have been less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Teachers who want to practice what we have preached for many years.

lender.name: Dominick
lender.loan_because: I believe in a power of ingenuity and hard work
lender.occupational_info: I own a real estate development company in Canada

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Because it's easier to "remember the poor" than it is to "forgive my enemies". Now if I could just remember who said that.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers building websites that make businesses more profitable.

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: Finding a job here in the Philippines is hard thats why I want to put-up my own buisness

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I read about Kiva and was absolutely enthusiastic about this simple system of helping each other. With a little amount you can really help people to investigate in their future and to help themselves by their own power. They keep their dignity! ItÂ´s not just a donation from somebody of the accidentally rich part of the world but a helping each other at eye level.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a machine building company which has lots of work to do right now. My department is in charge of the sites. We send our people to all over the world to build up the machines which our customers buy. One part of my job is to keep the work of my collegues running by taking care and developing the management system.

lender.name: Oscar Luis
lender.occupation: interior designer and novel writer in my freetime
lender.loan_because: I think it's the best investment that can be done- an investment in people!
lender.occupational_info: I'm one of three associates in a small company that designs and sells projects of office interior, design and furniture. We had help to start- now I think it's a matter of justice towards whatever or whoever rules this Universe that I pay back the luck I had helping others to do so.

lender.name: MCTN Family
lender.loan_because: Its easy to forget that we are part of a much bigger world
lender.occupational_info: Mum and Dad are a bit unusual and the kids are a bit silly

lender.name: Horst
lender.loan_because: The best way of development assistance

lender.name: Carlijn
lender.loan_because: I believe we can make a difference and make live better for less fortunate in this world.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I'm working as a landeconomist but my passion is to do work in developing countries. In august I'm off to Central -and South America to learn Spanish and volunteer for 3 months.

lender.name: Claudia Cano Wolff
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in life based on their working hard to be independently employed and providing for themselves as well as their community. I'm especially interested in the Dominican Republic, homeland of my parents.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, a graphic designer, and an editor. I am studying Psychology. My job requires me to design many things on the computer and to read documents and books to make sure they are free of errors.

lender.name: Volker
lender.loan_because: I can, so i do

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want the money I give charitably to go further.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying at an Australian university to become a doctor.

lender.name: Holy Trinity Church
lender.loan_because: The greater Episcopal Church has made a commitment to the Millennium Development Goals initiative, and Holy Trinity Episcopal Church, a mission church located in Brookville, Pennsylvania, has committed a percentage of its budget toward outreach programs that are in accordance with the MDG initiative.
lender.occupational_info: All the money raised by our church for disbursement by Kiva lenders comes from our annual coffee sale. We sell Pura Vida coffee, and all the profits go toward our outreach account. For any group looking for a great way to raise money, please visit Pura Vida Coffee at www.puravidacoffee.com/fundraising.php to learn more.

lender.name: Florence
lender.loan_because: This is what God instructs us to do to love others and help them anyway we can. I love you all!
lender.occupational_info: A missionary of the "Love Walk" with God. Being blessed to be a blessing to others in the world.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in any way I can. I think sharing our success with others so that they can have success of their own is the best way to nuture the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am an English teacher living in Germany. I help people everyday in my classes by teaching them to communicate better. For many of my students, learning English is important for their careers.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: people who have the drive and the ambition to realize a dream should be able to make that dream a reality.

lender.name: Steffen & Ines
lender.loan_because: We like to share.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in somebody else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am presently a student about to enter university. I am going into international business and would like to help someone get their business started.

lender.name: Wolfgang
lender.loan_because: I can - and hope to help.

lender.name: Make Your Difference.Org
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I started my own business an I want to help those that help themselves and who will eventually help others.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small manufacturing company that makes drill bits.

lender.name: Ravin
lender.occupational_info: I try to work freelance.

lender.name: Gunhild
lender.loan_because:
With a small amount of money you can help people all around the world to improve their lives on their own.
Microfinance is one of the best ways to make the world a better place and the most amazing thing: it works!
lender.occupational_info: Development cooperation and research on development issues.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to
